remarks: Lemma for ~ ulmdv .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ulmdv.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
ulmdv.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
ulmdv.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
ulmdv.f $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> ( CC ^m X ) ) $.
ulmdv.g $e |- ( ph -> G : X --> CC ) $.
ulmdv.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ z e. X ) -> ( k e. Z |-> ( ( F ` k ) ` z ) ) ~~> ( G ` z ) ) $.
ulmdv.u $e |- ( ph -> ( k e. Z |-> ( S _D ( F ` k ) ) ) ( ~~>u ` X ) H ) $.
ulmdvlem1.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> C e. X ) $.
ulmdvlem1.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> R e. RR+ ) $.
ulmdvlem1.u $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> U e. RR+ ) $.
ulmdvlem1.v $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> W e. RR+ ) $.
ulmdvlem1.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> U < W ) $.
ulmdvlem1.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( C ( ball ` ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( S X. S ) ) ) U ) C_ X ) $.
ulmdvlem1.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( abs ` ( Y - C ) ) < U ) $.
ulmdvlem1.n $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> N e. Z ) $.
ulmdvlem1.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> A. m e. ( ZZ>= ` N ) A. x e. X ( abs ` ( ( ( S _D ( F ` N ) ) ` x ) - ( ( S _D ( F ` m ) ) ` x ) ) ) < ( ( R / 2 ) / 2 ) ) $.
ulmdvlem1.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( abs ` ( ( ( S _D ( F ` N ) ) ` C ) - ( H ` C ) ) ) < ( R / 2 ) ) $.
ulmdvlem1.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> Y e. X ) $.
ulmdvlem1.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> Y =/= C ) $.
ulmdvlem1.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( ( abs ` ( Y - C ) ) < W -> ( abs ` ( ( ( ( ( F ` N ) ` Y ) - ( ( F ` N ) ` C ) ) / ( Y - C ) ) - ( ( S _D ( F ` N ) ) ` C ) ) ) < ( ( R / 2 ) / 2 ) ) ) $.
ulmdvlem1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( abs ` ( ( ( ( G ` Y ) - ( G ` C ) ) / ( Y - C ) ) - ( H ` C ) ) ) < R ) $.
